cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuni

sentence.kanji: 棒をテープで固定しなさい。
sentence.romaji: bou wo te-pu de kotei shinasai
sentence.english: Fix the stick in place with tape.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's narasu

sentence.kanji: 水の温度に体を慣らしてから、潜ったほうがいいぞ。
sentence.romaji: mizu no ondo ni karada wo narashite kara moguta hou ga ii zo
sentence.english: You should dive only after getting your body used to the water temperature.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chuukoku

sentence.kanji: 先生からの忠告を聞くべきだよ。
sentence.romaji: sensei kara no chuukoku wo kiku beki da yo
sentence.english: You should follow the teacher's advice.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's on

sentence.kanji: このご恩は一生忘れません。
sentence.romaji: kono goon ha ishou wasuremasen
sentence.english: I will never forget this kindness.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's megumareru

sentence.kanji: 当日は天気に恵まれました。
sentence.romaji: toujitsu ha tenki ni megumaremashita
sentence.english: We were blessed with good weather that day.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's awatadashii

sentence.kanji: 今日は慌ただしい一日でした。
sentence.romaji: kyou ha awatadashii ichinichi deshita
sentence.english: It was a busy day today.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's awateru

sentence.kanji: そんなに慌ててどこに行くの。
sentence.romaji: sonnani awatete doko ni iku no
sentence.english: Where are you going in such a hurry?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nikumu

sentence.kanji: 彼はもう彼女を憎んではいないよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha mou kanojo wo nikunde ha inai yo
sentence.english: He no longer hates her.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nikushimi

sentence.kanji: 彼の心は憎しみに満ちていたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare no kokoro ha nikushimi ni michite ita n da
sentence.english: His heart was filled with hatred.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nikurashii

sentence.kanji: 妹は時々憎らしいことを言うんだ。
sentence.romaji: imouto ha tokidoki nikurashii koto wo iu n da
sentence.english: My little sister sometimes says hateful things.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nikui

sentence.kanji: 彼が憎いですか。
sentence.romaji: kare ga nikui desu ka
sentence.english: Do you hate him?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaiten

sentence.kanji: 彼はボールに回転を掛けたんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha bo-ru ni kaiten wo kaketa n da
sentence.english: He put a spin on the ball.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's binkan

sentence.kanji: 彼女は流行に敏感だね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha ryuukou ni binkan da ne
sentence.english: She's sensitive to the latest trends.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuyashii

sentence.kanji: 試合に負けてとても悔しい。
sentence.romaji: shiai ni makete totemo kuyashii
sentence.english: I'm so frustrated that we lost the game.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kakugo

sentence.kanji: 覚悟はできています。
sentence.romaji: kakugo ha dekite imasu
sentence.english: I am prepared.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanshin

sentence.kanji: 彼の我慢強さには感心しました。
sentence.romaji: kare no gamanzuyosa ni ha kanshin shimashita
sentence.english: I admired his patience.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinri

sentence.kanji: 顧客心理を理解することは重要です。
sentence.romaji: kokyaku shinri wo rikai suru koto ha juuyou desu
sentence.english: It's important to understand customer psychology.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ganko

sentence.kanji: なんて頑固な子だ。
sentence.romaji: nante ganko na ko da
sentence.english: What an obstinate child she is!

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kenchou

sentence.kanji: あの白い建物が県庁です。
sentence.romaji: ano shiroi tatemono ga kenchou desu
sentence.english: That white building is the prefectural government office.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chou

sentence.kanji: 彼は県庁で働いています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kenchou de hataraite imasu
sentence.english: He works for the prefectural government.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's osore

sentence.kanji: 叔父には心臓病の恐れがあります。
sentence.romaji: oji ni ha shinzoubyou no osore ga arimasu
sentence.english: There's a possibility my uncle has heart disease.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gakuen

sentence.kanji: 彼女は郊外の学園に通っているね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kougai no gakuen ni kayote iru ne
sentence.english: She goes to a school in the suburbs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omowazu

sentence.kanji: 嬉しくて思わず涙が出ました。
sentence.romaji: ureshikute omowazu namida ga demashita
sentence.english: I was so happy that I suddenly burst into tears.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omoiyari

sentence.kanji: 彼女の思いやりが嬉しかった。
sentence.romaji: kanojo no omoiyari ga ureshikata
sentence.english: I was glad for her kindness.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akogareru

sentence.kanji: 彼はパイロットの職に憧れているんだ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha pairoto no shoku ni akogarete iru n da
sentence.english: His ambition is to become a pilot.
